name: Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs) & SNARKs
description: Deep dive into ZK proofs, zk-SNARKs, and their application in privacy-preserving blockchain systems.

cards.title: What Are Zero-Knowledge Proofs?
cards.description: Understanding how one party can prove knowledge of a fact without revealing it.
cards.bulletpoints: Interactive vs. non-interactive ZKPs, privacy-enhancing applications, cryptographic principles
cards.summaryText: Explain how zero-knowledge protocols let provers convince verifiers without exposing the underlying secret.

cards.title: zk-SNARKs & zk-STARKs
cards.description: Exploring the different types of zero-knowledge proofs and their use cases.
cards.bulletpoints: Cryptographic setup, trusted vs. trustless computation, scaling solutions
cards.summaryText: Compare zk-SNARK trusted setups with STARK transparency to pick the right proof system for your project.

cards.title: Using ZKPs for Scalability & Privacy

cards.bulletpoints: ZK-Rollups, privacy-preserving smart contracts, L2 solutions
